name: Performance Test Case Template
description: Template for performance test cases in healthcare applications

structure.title: Performance Test: [metric] under [load]
structure.description: Test system performance for [metric] under specified load conditions
steps: Measure response times and resource usage
structure.expected_results: System should meet performance requirements: [requirements] with [tolerance] tolerance

test_data.response_time_threshold: Maximum acceptable response time in milliseconds
test_data.resource_usage_limits: CPU, memory, and disk usage limits

placeholders.[metric]: The performance metric being tested, e.g., 'response time' or 'throughput'
placeholders.[load]: The load condition, e.g., 'normal load' or 'peak load'
placeholders.[scenario]: The test scenario, e.g., 'patient data retrieval'
placeholders.[requirements]: The performance requirements, e.g., 'response time < 2 seconds'

response_time.title: Performance Test: Response Time under Normal Load
response_time.description: Test response time for patient search functionality under normal load
steps: Set up APM tool for monitoring
Simulate 50 concurrent users searching for patients
Measure average response time for search requests
response_time.expected_results: Average response time should be less than 2 seconds with 95% of requests under 3 seconds
